Product Name: Peugeot Antique Bistro 1874 Pepper Mill, 12cmPeugeot Antique Bistro 1874 Pepper Mill, 12cm
Item Description: Directly inspired by the iconic Z model from 1874, this special reissue combines woodwork and steel, in a celebration of the historic craftsmanship that made Peugeot renowned. Made in France Grind adjustment button: the tighter it is screwed, the finer the grind and vice versa Lifetime mechanism warranty Pepper Mill: for grinding black, white, green, red, and pink peppercorns (no more than 15% pink in a pepper blend) and coriander seeds up to 6mm in diameter. Do not grind salt in your pepper mill. Easily identify the differences between your classic bistro mills by looking for the printed P or S on the opposite side of the Peugeot logo.

Product Name: Peugeot Isen Long Pepper Mill, 16cmPeugeot Isen Long Pepper Mill, 16cm
Item Description: Here is the first Peugeot mill specifically designed for long pepper and large peppercorns. This manual wooden mill is the perfect instrument for fans of peppers from around the world, especially long pepper varieties. You will no longer need a mortar and pestle to grind your long pepper. The Isen Pepper Mill's oversized mechanism can now easily take and grind this type of elongated pepper.

Product Name: Peugeot Isen u'Select Pepper Mill with Crank Handle, 18cmPeugeot Isen u'Select Pepper Mill with Crank Handle, 18cm
Item Description: With the u’Select system allowing highly precise grinding adjustment and its contemporary ergonomic shiny metal handle, the Isen pepper mill revisits the lines of historic Peugeot mills, with a touch of modernity.

Product Name: Peugeot Daman Electric u'Select Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 16cmPeugeot Daman Electric u'Select Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 16cm
Item Description: With this set of electric mills, Peugeot is reinforcing its innovative streak to offer the ultimate in functionality, and focusing on the playful and intuitive use of its mills. The Daman electric mill operates at the touch of a button. Efficient and silent, just pressing the button once is all it takes to produce the perfect amount of salt or pepper. In addition, there is special lighting to help you to keep a close eye on the amount of spice being ground. The Daman electric salt and pepper mills are practical, as they can be operated with one hand while you're using the other to cook with. A Peugeot signature, the patented u'Select grind control system at the base of the mills gives a taste result that is beyond perfection. Moreover, for the salt mill, its Zirconia mechanism, an innovation from Peugeot Research and Development, delivers extremely fine Powdered Salt, offering the taste pleasure of salt while limiting the quantity used. Elegance and practicality are the keywords of this set of Peugeot mills. Why not add it to your wishlist or perhaps it would make a great gift for someone who loves cooking. Compact and ergonomic design Press the button on the top of the mill to activate it Transparent reservoir helps you identify the contents quickly Equipped with a light to help you check how much salt is being ground u'Select grind adjustment system with six predefined settings 5-year product warranty Pepper Mill: For grinding black, white, green and red pepper, pink peppercorns (no more than 15% in a pepper blend) and coriander seeds - Salt Mill : For grinding dry salt (rock salt) with a crystal size of less than or equal to 4 mm. Not suitable for use with sea salt, sea flakes or wet salt

Product Name: Peugeot Daman Electric u'Select Pepper Mill, 16cmPeugeot Daman Electric u'Select Pepper Mill, 16cm
Item Description: This 16cm u'Select Electric Pepper Mill features a beautiful iridescent black finish, which pairs perfectly with its stainless steel base. Practical and stylish, this mill is easy to use and adjust; simply select one of the six pre-defined grind settings on the base of the mill for a finer or coarser grind. Its modern, compact design blends seamlessly into any kitchen. Compact and ergonomic design A transparent reservoir helps you identify the contents quickly Equipped with a light to help you check how much pepper is being ground u'Select grinding mechanism with six predefined grind settings Lifetime mechanism warranty

Product Name: Peugeot Elis Sense u'Select Electric Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 20cmPeugeot Elis Sense u'Select Electric Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 20cm

Product Name: Peugeot Line Electric Pepper Mill, 15cmPeugeot Line Electric Pepper Mill, 15cm

Product Name: Peugeot Paris Prestige Pepper Mill, 110cmPeugeot Paris Prestige Pepper Mill, 110cm
Item Description: The Peugeot Paris Prestige pepper mill is a remarkable piece. Its complete refinement marks two centuries of Peugeot history. Its height of 1 metre 10 cm makes it a powerfully beautiful giant pepper mill. The body and head are produced from a single piece of solid wood, in tribute to the region where Peugeot originated, the Franche-Comté. Functional, it is equipped with a grind control knob located on the head to adjust pepper grinding, and a pepper mechanism that comes with a lifetime guarantee. With a black lacquer finish, the Paris Prestige pepper mill is the epitome of poise. The logo, sculpted in metal, alludes to Peugeot’s two hundred year history, the rolling of steel. The shiny metal plinth offers a magnificent base. Finally the metal cup, covering the pepper mill, gives the final touch. This unique pepper mill has its own number, as one of a limited edition, accompanied by its certificate of authenticity.

Product Name: Peugeot Lalique Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 9cmPeugeot Lalique Salt & Pepper Mills Duo, 9cm
Item Description: René Lalique is the founder of the famous French crystal glassware house of the same name. In 1924 he worked with Peugeot to create the "Leaves” mill. The bringing together of these two fields of expertise naturally produced an exceptional piece, made entirely of crystal, with an art deco look with unique light and transparency effects. A century later, the Lalique House and the Peugeot factory are reissuing this model. The reproduction of the “leaves” motifs calls for use of ultra-modern techniques, combined with the manual actions of fifteen craftsmen. This exceptional duo of mills pays tribute to unique expertise. An outstanding model that will delight lovers of Art Deco and precious objects.

Product Name: Peugeot Palace Pepper Mill, 10cmPeugeot Palace Pepper Mill, 10cm
Item Description: The Palace Pepper Mill is a replica of the first mill created by Peugeot in 1874. The silver plated, polished wood is luxurious and classic. Made in France Mechanism with a lifetime guarantee Classic grinding mechanism Ideal gift for yourself or others For grinding black, white, green, and red pepper, pink peppercorns (no more than 15% in a pepper blend) and coriander seeds. Grind adjustment button: the more the button is screwed, the finer the grind, and vice versa.

Product Name: Peugeot Mignonnette Pepper Mill, 10cmPeugeot Mignonnette Pepper Mill, 10cm
Item Description: A genuine piece of fine silverware, the reissue of the first Peugeot model In 1874, at the height of the  golden age of gastronomy , Peugeot created its very first pepper mill, model Z. This fine piece adorned the tables of the grandest of banquets. To bring pleasure to history lovers and those who appreciate beautiful objects, Peugeot decided to reissue this magnificent pepper mill in a modernised version.  the Mignonnette pepper mill  is a genuine piece of fine silverware, produced in a high quality silver-plated metal. Equipped with the Peugeot mechanism, it guarantees a perfect and incomparable result. Finally, like all pieces of fine silverware, it does deserve a bit of special care on your part (regular buffing with a chamois cloth or a product specifically for silver-plated metal).

Product Name: Peugeot Vittel Pepper Mill, 23cmPeugeot Vittel Pepper Mill, 23cm
Item Description: The Vittel pepper mill has a pure and slender profile. Chrome accents enhance the transparency of the mill . Clear acrylic combined with shiny metal With its fine slender silhouette, the Vittel pepper mill is full of charm. This transparent mill clearly shows any Pepper that is contained. Its waist is highlighted elegantly by the chrome-plated ring. It has a button, engraved with the Peugeot lion's head, that is used to adjust the pepper coarseness. Loosen the button to give coarser grinding, Tighten the knob for finer ground pepper. This mill is equipped with the Peugeot steel grinding mechanism, with a strong cutting edge, which comes with a lifetime guarantee. This compact mill will look just right on your table and can be presented as a pair with the Vittel salt mill. Product Name: Peugeot Royan Pepper Mill, 14cmPeugeot Royan Pepper Mill, 14cm

Product Name: Peugeot Madras Pepper Mill, 21cmPeugeot Madras Pepper Mill, 21cm
Item Description: Awaken your senses with this manual pepper mill from the Paris u'Select collection. Classic lines, the Peugeot pepper mill is essential for chefs and lovers of flavour. Product Name: Peugeot Paris Antique Pepper Mill, 22cmPeugeot Paris Antique Pepper Mill, 22cm
Item Description: In tribute to the exceptional adventure of the Peugeot mills, the Paris Antique collection pepper mill evokes the past. The magical charm of the patina of age has been restored by hand with the greatest delicacy. The PEFC™ certified beech wood used to carve the mill is selected with the greatest care. Product Name: Peugeot Paris Nature Pepper Mill, 40cmPeugeot Paris Nature Pepper Mill, 40cm
Item Description: Peugeot's classic and timeless manual wooden pepper mill has been a favourite among fine-dining fans for many years. This mill features the perfect ergonomic design for use on the table. This nature-inspired pepper mill will elevate the look of your countertops in a minimalist way, and become your favourite cooking companion for years to come. The button on top, marked with the brand's lion head in black for pepper, allows you to easily adjust the grind size according to your taste. A finer grind for more heat, or a coarser grind for a more intense flavour. Product Name: Peugeot Bistro Nature Pepper Mill, 10cmPeugeot Bistro Nature Pepper Mill, 10cm
Item Description: The body of the French-made Bistro Nature pepper mill is made from bits of wood that are discarded during the manufacturing process. The wood is given a textured finish by blasting with ground nutshells. This technique offers the wood a unique look and feel. An eco-friendly varnish comprising linseed oil and carnauba wax is then applied to extend the mill's service life and increase its resistance to wear and tear. As with all Peugeot mills, the Bistro Nature pepper mill features a lifetime-guaranteed steel mechanism. The 10 cm Bistro Nature mill is filled with Kampot black pepper grown on a certified organic and fair trade farm. In the kitchen, this powerful pepper with its fruity notes will enhance your culinary showstoppers

Product Name: Peugeot Bistro Antique Pepper Mill in Aged Wood, 10 cmPeugeot Bistro Antique Pepper Mill in Aged Wood, 10 cm
Item Description: In 1874, Peugeot invented its first table pepper mill, model Z and thus revolutionized the world of gastronomy. Reissue of this model, the Bistro pepper mill is emblematic of Peugeot expertise and has become an essential in cafes and French bouchons. This Peugeot vintage pepper mill is made of aged beech wood. Each item is unique and worked by hand with the greatest delicacy to restore the beauty and charm of a patina of age. The Antique Bistro mill is equipped with Peugeot’s exclusive pepper mechanism, which comes with a lifetime guarantee. The grind can be adjusted using the knob located on the head of the mill. The tighter it is screwed in, the finer the pepper. A tribute to the charms of the past, the wooden Antique Bistro pepper mill will bring a touch of nostalgia to your home.

Product Name: Peugeot Bistro Pepper Mill in Acrylic, 10 cmPeugeot Bistro Pepper Mill in Acrylic, 10 cm
Item Description: Bistro, the first table mill, created in 1874 and featuring Peugeot's original design, has been updated in transparent acrylic to bring a contemporary look to the table. This French-made manual pepper mill gained iconic status as a typical fixture on restaurant tables. This model is equipped with a patented mechanism featuring a lifetime warranty. It has been designed to grind black, white, red and green pepper, as well as pink peppercorns (if mixed with another pepper). The jewel button on top of the mill adjusts the grind setting in a single motion. Made in France Mechanism with a lifetime warranty For grinding black, white, green, and red pepper, pink peppercorns (no more than 15% in a pepper blend) and coriander seeds Grind adjustment button: the more the button is screwed, the finer the grind, and vice versa

Product Name: Peugeot Bistro Pepper Mill, 10 cmPeugeot Bistro Pepper Mill, 10 cm
Item Description: A reproduction of the silhouette of the first Peugeot model created in 1874, the Bistro wooden pepper mill is one of the models that are most emblematic of Peugeot. This mill is a great classic as a treat for yourself or a gift for a loved one. Made In France PEFC wood from French Forests Classic grinding mechanism Lifetime mechanism warranty For best use, only grind black, white, green, red and pink peppercorns (up to 15% in a blend). Do not grind salt in pepper mill.
